name: Hooked on a Ceiling
description:
This game is the result of a group of 9 capstone students in my final year of University. The game was shown at PAX Australia 2019 at the Swinburne Student booth. 

The culmination of a years worth of work, this game reflects the skills of all those involved.

The game is released as is, in an unfinished ~alpha~ state, designed for demonstration as a portfolio asset or other professional purposes, and not as a playable product.

Thanks for your consideration.
